communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Hello, 

I am requesting copies of records related to department-specific pay, OT, or non-monetary gifts (challenge coins, medals, trophies) for bonus opportunities. These include opportunities like marksmanship bonuses or other skill-based rewards the department gives to officers. 

Documents, memos, or policies related to bonus opportunities, available bonuses, the amount or item given out, and requirements/standards to achieve those bonuses. 
Records from databases, Excel docs, or other recording documents outline officers who received the bonus, what it was for, dates, and reward amount or gift given. 
Please search 2018 to December 2024.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Joey Scott

title: George H. W. Bush Presidential Library: WHTV Tapes of September 15 1992 Sandia Laboratory Albuquerque visit

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

White House Communications Agency footage (WHTV content) filmed during President George H. W. Bush's visit and speech at the Sandia National Laboratory on September 15th of 1992. This is a request for all footage, including arrival and departure at the event, the speech itself, as well as for any outtakes and rushes. It would be greatly appreciated if any video released as a result of this request could be uploaded to the @TheBushLibrary YouTube channel. 

Here's a link to a transcript of the event: https://bush41library.tamu.edu/archives/public-papers/4798

Thank you for the George Bush Presidential Library's dedication to transparency, and I look forward to working with you until this request is resolved.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Robert Delaware

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New Jersey Open Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All arrest records for Lamar (Lance) Alford from 1990 to 2006. Particularly, an arrest for homicide in 2005. 

Thank you.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Marc Howard
